ygData.subject: Re: Cinda's Charismatic Carrillion
ygData.msgSnippet: It s up to you.  I believe that the song works, but that its effect is very small.  Usually, prices do not change for me when I use it.  I was, however, able
ygData.messageBody:
It's up to you. I believe that the song works, but that its effect is very
small. Usually, prices do not change for me when I use it. I was, however,
able to get an NPC to talk to me who would not before.

If you are short on money, I think this is a good candidate to skip until
you have more funds available.

Jyzan
